channel.title: How to make it so only certain defence levels can wear things?
channel.description: On my server (MTPV2 Sourced [PI]) I am having problems... I have people with like 1 defence, and their wearing statius and vesta and stuff. What I need to know, is how to make is so you need like 80 defence to wear statius. I am also having problems with chaotics, people are 1 attack wearing c mauls and basicly just making it un-fair for the rest of the pure community :(. PLEASE HELP
